author: Peter Opoku
title: +Rideshare-CO2 = Ada
description: Our planet's ecosystem is being destroyed by high carbon emissions, worsened by the fact that too many solo drivers are on the road.
solution: Incentivize ride-sharing by tokenizing and issuing carbon "credits" in ADA as a reward to users for CO2 emissions saved on shared trips.
experience:
PaalUp: 3 fullstack developers one of which also front end/mobile developer
WADA: Haskell, Elm, & Plutus support and project oversight
